name: AMON (itch)
description:
Amazing Midget Over Normandy is a game that was created in a game jam by a small team of first year computer science students. The name was generated by http://videogamena.me/ and we then had 48 hours to create a game based on the name. This is the result, created with C# and XNA.

The aim of the game is effectively just to survive for a minute. I cannot guarantee that the ending works as intended due to the difficulty level getting in the way of my testing efforts.
